title: Global Mine Action 2008/09
description: Mine action is an important element of the aid program. Australia has a mine action pledge of $75 million over 5 years from the 2005-06 FY. The Global Mine Action allocation supports mine action activities in areas such as advocacy, Convention support, research and quality improvement. Organisations supported include the Intl Campaign to Ban Landmines (Landmine Monitor Report) and United Nations Mine Action Service (UNMAS). The total value of this initiative is $0.5 million exoensed over 2 years, starting in the 2008-09 financial year.
